entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT ENDED, Abbotsford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:20 AM PST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 5.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Abbotsford Airport 03:00 AM PST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 5.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 77 %
Dewpoint: 1.6°C
Wind: S 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending after midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 before morning. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 8:58 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:58 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers early in the evening then 30 percent chance of flurries late in the evening. Wind becoming northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 in the evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 8:58 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Windy. High zero. Forecast issued 8:58 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023
